Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously crafted to meet the highest standards. It's designed to enhance your daily life with its unique features and superior quality. Given its exceptional value, I believe it's worth more than its face value of $120. Considering its worth and the benefits it offers, I am offering it to you for $150. This price reflects not only the cost of production but also the time, effort, and dedication put into creating this product. I trust that you will find it to be a worthwhile investment. Looking forward to your positive response. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $150. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $150
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $80
